data: {"generalSituation":"A northeast monsoon will affect the coast of southern China in the next couple of days, temperatures will fall slightly and the weather will be dry over the region. Under the influence of a replenishment of the monsoon, it will be windy and cloudier over the coast of Guangdong early next week. An anticyclone aloft is expected to cover southern China in the middle part of next week, the weather will be brighter but slightly cooler in the morning over the region. Besides, an area of low pressure will affect the central and southern parts of the South China Sea over the weekend. Another area of low pressure will develop gradually over the western North Pacific to the east of the Philippines, with a higher chance of moving across the Philippines and entering the central and southern parts of the South China Sea midweek next week, moving towards the vicinity of Vietnam.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251101","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4, occasionally force 5.","forecastWeather":"Sunny periods. Dry during the day.
